lead_paragraph: LEIBSON--Roberta, age 84, on April 1, 2016. Beloved mother of Andrea Leeds and Michael Hirschkorn. Brother of Jason M. Shulman and dear friend of Morton Weiner. Graveside Ceremony at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, L.I., Sunday, April 17, 2016 at 1pm sharp. 1/3
